description: This file defines a React component 'ProtectedRoute' that acts as a route guard for authentication and user roles, redirecting unauthenticated users and ensuring role-based access control.

methods.name: ProtectedRoute({ children, requireListener = false })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders guarded content based on user authentication and role status.
